MAN.TITLE: xor
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Performs per-element bit-wise "exclusive or" operation on two arrays

DESCRIPTION.P:
xorOperation mask, 8-bit single channel array; specifies elements of destination array to be changed.
The function Xor calculates per-element bit-wise logical conjunction of two arrays:
ima_out(I)=ima_A(I)^ima_B(I)
